full_threads.body:
Hi Xavier,

Thanks so much for the clear direction, the screenshots were super helpful!

Just a quick update:
  • I’ve removed all “Check Availability” tabs across the site to match the Excavator layout
  • All pages have been updated and the cache is cleared

Here’s a quick example for reference:
👉 Hitachi 25 Tonne Wheel Loader

All sorted on our end, feel free to take a look and let me know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted - always happy to help.

Hi Allie,

Thanks for the update.

Can we please remove all the "Check Availability" tabs across the website to be the same as the Excavator category?

Below are screenshots of what we want to reflect across all categories.

Screenshot #1 = Excavator Quick Quote Tab


Screenshot #2 = Excavator Specification Sheet Tab


Screenshot #3 =

Kind regards,
Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING EXECUTIVE



P: 08 8210 4000 D: 08 8210 4013 E: Xavier@RAMEquipment.com.au A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033



Confidentiality disclaimer: Emails contain sensitive information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose any information. Notify us immediately and delete the corresponding email.

Hi Xavier,

Thanks again for your feedback - really appreciate it.

  • We’ve now updated the header so the full "Hire Equipment" button area is clickable, including the space above the text.
  • Regarding the tabs, could you elaborate on what you'd like us to update? For instance, would you like the "Check Availability" tab added to other pages as well?

    Here's an example for reference:
    https://ramequipment.com.au/product/hitachi-25-tonne-wheel-loader/

Just to confirm, would you like us to apply this same tab update to all attachments as well? As soon as we get the go-ahead, we’ll take care of the rest.

Let us know if we’re good to proceed!
Hey team still investigating the issue 🙏

Hi Xavier,

Thank you so much for letting us know and for the screenshot, super helpful.

We’ll take another look at the “Hire Equipment” dropdown to make sure the entire button area is fully clickable, not just the text and lower portion.

We’ll also roll out the tab updates (Quick Quote, Check Availability, Specification Sheet) across all relevant categories - not just the excavator section.

I’ll send through a quick update once those changes are live.

Appreciate your patience and always happy to help!

Hi Andy,

Thanks for checking the buttons in the header.

There are still a few areas above the "Hire Equipment" button that don't activate the drop-down menu. Could we please ensure the whole button area is clickable, not just the text and below it? I've attached a snapshot highlighting these areas. These are areas where our website visitors get frustrated before they move on from the home page.


Also, I've noticed the updates to the tabs (Quick Quote, Check Availability, Specification Sheet) have only been applied to the excavator category. Could we apply these changes across the entire website?



Thanks again for your help!

Kind regards,
Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING EXECUTIVE



P: 08 8210 4000 D: 08 8210 4013 E: Xavier@RAMEquipment.com.au A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033



Confidentiality disclaimer: Emails contain sensitive information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose any information. Notify us immediately and delete the corresponding email.

Workflow **Assign Expert Plan (AC - Apr 16)** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hi Xavier,

Hope you're having a lovely day! Thank you so for letting us know.

I’ve gone ahead and made an update:
  • The "HIRE Equipment" button is now fully clickable, including the drop-down arrow
  • It also correctly follows the linked page when clicked

You can check it out here: ramequipment.com.au

This should feel a lot smoother for your visitors now.

Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like to adjust—always happy to help.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
Hi Xavier,

Okay thanks for the insight - for sure we can get this updated.

Looping in @Wolf IQ Support to take care of and confirm.

Thanks,
Andy

On Thu, Jul 24, 2025 at 11:40 AM Xavier Bauwmans | RAM Equipment <Xavier@ramequipment.com.au> wrote:

Hi Andy,

We still have all the recordings from all the sessions earlier on in the year.

Our rage and dead clicks seem to revolve around not being able to click on all parts of the buttons in our header.

Our visitors are forced to click on the "HIRE Equipment" text but if they click anywhere around the text nothing happens even when they click on the drop-down arrow (hover function) - highlighted in yellow.

Would it be possible to get the drop-down arrow to expand and retract whenever the button is clicked on as well as the functionality to follow the page as clicked on.



Feel free to call me for further clarifications to sort this out.

Kind regards,

 Xavier Bauwmans
 MARKETING EXECUTIVE

Hi Xavier,

Thanks for letting me know.

Sounds like there may have been a conflict with the previous install - sometimes that happens if the script isn't loaded quite right.


Happy to take another look and install it in a way that's lightweight and won't interfere with the back end, if that's something you'd be open to down the track?

No pressure at all - just let us know if you'd like to revisit it.

Thanks,
Andy
